Text: rythm of the beast, my bad
I do not recall that version of Drifter being in this album. As far as I remember, that version is live in the Palasport Reggio Emilia, actually in 1981 (I have that recording).
And that "Rhythm of the Beast" is Nicko McBrain in 1990, when then re-released all their singles with extra material.
